message.content: {"id": "116786", "title": "Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.", "description": "", "OB": "When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer is currently storing the absolute path instead of the relative path. For example, I noticed that the report design includes the absolute path: <property name=\"fileName\"/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property><property name=\"namespace\">lib1</property>. We need to modify the behavior so that the relative path is saved instead.", "EB": "", "SR": "The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when a library is included in a report design. For instance, if the report design is located at $project/test and we include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the relative path should be used instead of the absolute path."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
